cc:Work.dc:title: Elvie #012
cc:Work.dc:description:
[Panel 1] Elvie: I decided it was time to learn a new language, so I opted for "C" on the Arduino platform…
[Panel 2: Elvie is next to a pile of circuit boards] Elvie: But by the time I'd chosen between the Arduino Uno, Due, Esplora, Nuova Generazione, Diecimila and Duemilanove
[Panel 3] Ho deciso di imparare soltanto l'italiano, invece!*
[Panel 3 footnote] *I decided to just learn Italian instead!
